work1.title: Olympic Games - Eâ‚¬onomic Impact
work1.desc: A data visualisation about the financial impact of the Olympic Games throughout history. This was an assignment for a data visualisation course.

work2.title: The Twice-Burned Library
work2.desc: A design for a book about the library of Louvain which burned twice; once in each world war. The book was written by Richard Ovenden. This was an assignment for a book design course.

work3.title: The Fall Of Icarus
work3.desc: A website that takes you back to the Greek tale of Icarus and his father Daedalus. This website was for a frontend course.

work4.title: Ligne Al-Ham-Bru
work4.desc: A project for Bright Brussels festival, using different media to represent the Alhambra neighbourhood in Brussels. This project was for a data visualisation course.

work5.title: Art
work5.desc: A selection of some personal drawing and sketching work.
